past |factor|
====

**P'ast** (IPA: [pʰɑst], stylized as *փաստ*) is a random quote
fetching console utility. Written in Factor.

|screenshot|

Installing
----------

+ Use latest **x86_64** binary from `releases <https://github.com/q60/past/releases>`__

Building and installing manually
--------------------------------

You need *Factor* and *GNU make* to build and install **փաստ**.

.. code-block:: sh

   make
   sudo make install

Running
-------

.. code-block:: sh

   past

Uninstalling
------------

.. code-block:: sh

   sudo make uninstall

.. |screenshot| image:: https://i.imgur.com/qITFzLg.jpg
.. |factor| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/-Factor-636746?style=for-the-badge&logoWidth=26&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
